document.full_text: key figures in the n.f.l. labor negotiations met secretly this week, indicating interest by both sides in getting a new collective bargaining agreement in place by july.
document.title: talks show progress on deal for n.f.l.
lines_and_colors: key figures in the n.f.l. labor negotiations met secretly this week, indicating interest by both sides in getting a new collective bargaining agreement in place by july.
